availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Harrison Rose (Grant County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of John Harrison and Sarah Rose. Married to Lucy Ann Baker Rose in Mercer County, Kentucky on May 14, 1863. Resident in Grant County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident in Grant County, Kentucky in 1860. Arrested for burglary with his father John in August 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant, p. 317A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant, p. 896. KYR-0001-004-0061.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film #000191864.
